div.h3: Reviews created for delgadod for sprint Ballina 4
div.p: This gives a way to access review timelines, see revisions, see files, see comments, apply/reference key word indicators.

tr.td: FAB-999: Added new JUnit test for widget tag under intake.
FAB-1925: Updated adjudication rules according to the new ADTs.
FAB-2065: Moved the creation of AvailabilityRestrictions to the ReasonsMultipaintContainerWidget to avoid persisting blank objects
